About Me

I am a Machine Learning Engineer with 3+ years of experience designing and deploying scalable MLOps solutions for Fortune 500 clients. My expertise spans building production-grade ML applications, automating data pipelines, and monitoring deployed systems â€” primarily on Microsoft Azure.


Currently pursuing a Masters in Applied Data Science at USC, I am expanding my knowledge across the full ML lifecycle while applying my engineering background to real-world challenges.


Beyond work, I enjoy traveling, connecting with new people, and exploring philosophy and spirituality; perspectives that shape how I approach collaboration and problem-solving.
